WRONG_LIST: Make sure list size is equal to entered number of years
SHARES_PERCENTAGE_ERROR: Sum of shares percentages of all years must be equal to 100%
COMPANY_ACCESS_DENIED: Your company doesn't have access to this ESOP
TOTAL_SHARES_ERROR: Error occurred while updating total ESOP shares
EMPLOYEES_VESTING_ERROR: Error occurred while fetching vesting employees list
INSUFFICIENT_TOTAL_SHARES_ERROR: New total shares is less than the shares already allocated to your employees
